title: Deploy StaySpread

requirements.text: Deploy the StaySpread application to the Internet Computer network, including all previously generated features: host dashboard, promoter dashboard with tracking metrics and social sharing, listings browse and detail pages, Stripe Checkout integration, Internet Identity authentication, PWA capabilities (manifest, service worker, install button), Founding 50 Hosts landing page, and social sharing buttons on listing and promoter dashboard pages.
acceptanceCriteria: The application deploys successfully to the Internet Computer without errors
The frontend canister serves the React application at the deployed URL
The backend canister is reachable and all API calls from the frontend resolve correctly
All existing routes are accessible in the deployed app

constraints: Do not modify any existing feature logic or UI â€” this is a deployment-only request
Do not alter immutable frontend paths
nonGoals: Changing any existing code logic, styling, or data models
